tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE lyrics_compositions (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
lyrics TEXT,
composer VARCHAR(255),
genre VARCHAR(100),
release_date DATE);

CREATE TABLE Songs (
    song_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    song_title TEXT,
    lyric_id INT,
    composer_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (lyric_id) REFERENCES Lyrics(lyric_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (composer_id) REFERENCES Composers(composer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Albums (
    album_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    album_title TEXT,
    release_year INT,
    song_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (song_id) REFERENCES Songs(song_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Lyrics (song_id INT, lyrics TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (song_id));
CREATE TABLE Songs (song_id INT, title TEXT, artist TEXT, genre TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (song_id));
CREATE TABLE Composers (composer_id INT, name TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (composer_id));

CREATE TABLE SongComposers (song_id INT, composer_id INT, PRIMARY KEY (song_id, composer_id), FOREIGN KEY (song_id) REFERENCES Songs(song_id), FOREIGN KEY (composer_id) REFERENCES Composers(composer_id));
CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (analysis_id INT, song_id INT, tempo FLOAT, sentiment TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (analysis_id), FOREIGN KEY (song_id) REFERENCES Songs(song_id));
